nodes.text: The Crosstown Bar, also known as Crosstown, was a tavern that located on the planet Cularin. It operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Following the Battle of Kromus during the Clone Wars, a number of people gathered in the Crosstown Bar to watch a broadcast on the tavern's holoprojector, where the Galactic Senate issued a statement of regret about the large-scale loss of life during the battle.
